summary: Encapsulates the outcome of an Lâ€‘BFGS optimization run, storing flags for convergence and failure, counts of iterations and function/gradient evaluations, the final parameter vector, objective value, gradient, and status codes describing termination conditions.
business_intent: Provides a structured result object that downstream code or users can inspect to determine whether the optimization succeeded, retrieve the optimal parameters and objective value, and understand why the algorithm stopped.
